description: Default list of fonts that are difficult to read for users with dyslexia, low vision, or other reading disabilities. This list is based on accessibility research and WCAG guidelines.

script_cursive.description: Script and cursive fonts with connected letters that make it difficult to distinguish individual characters, particularly problematic for users with dyslexia

decorative.description: Highly decorative fonts that prioritize aesthetics over readability, making them difficult to read for extended periods

narrow_condensed.description: Narrow and condensed fonts with tight letter spacing that reduce legibility, especially for users with low vision

blackletter_gothic.description: Historical blackletter and gothic fonts with complex letterforms that are extremely difficult to read

notes: Font names are stored in lowercase for case-insensitive matching
This list can be extended by projects via project-level configuration
Projects can also exclude specific fonts from this list if needed for their use case
